marklogic.body: The last three or four episodes have been weaker than usual. Community has been very eclectic but Â the writers managed to fit the pieces in a sound, whole picture, nowdays they just look like a assorted chocolate box - some taste good, others not so. Sure enough, they Always make a good work in ripping and paroding old tv & pop culture themes (the whole 1984, Cold war, corporate world was brilliant) but it seems the show is losing some of its freshness.
